entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
